name: filegator
description: FileGator is a multi-user, web-based file manager for self-hosted servers. It includes drag-and-drop uploads, folder permissions, and responsive UI, making it suitable for internal file sharing or shared storage access.
features: File Management: Multi-user web file manager, Drag-and-drop uploads, Folder permissions. Shared storage access simplified.
Responsive UI: Works on desktop and mobile. Access anywhere.
User Management: Multiple accounts and roles. Team collaboration.
Internal Sharing: Perfect for team file access. Controlled distribution.
File Previews: View documents and images. Quick inspection.
Search: Find files across directories. Efficient discovery.
Zip Support: Create and extract archives. Convenient packaging.
Text Editor: Edit files in browser. Quick modifications.
Customizable: Themes and plugins. Extensible platform.
